Doe has contacted both the attorneys for the State and for Defendant Epstein regarding this request, and neither has responded. WHEREFORE, Witness Y. Doe respectfully requests a protective order requiring that the deposition in the criminal case and the civil case captioned Jane Doe No. 3 v.
